title: How can we identify as to which era an old coin belongs to? - Quora

response.answer_text: Developing a thorough understanding of coinage from earlier eras is a task that can take of lifetime of study. The best way to start your search is to answer some basic questions about the coin, i.e. what region of the world is its likely origin, what is its approximate age, what material (copper, silver, gold, etc.) is it made of. Today there are many online sources which can aid your study. If you can provide any relevant information I’ll be happy to suggest where to turn next. Sometimes a good scan or both sides can provide the answer. Brian H.
